column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Perhaps my high expectations didn't help
column2: but I was a little underwhelmed.  I had the personal Malnati classic (with lean sausage)
column3: and while the crust was as good as other reviews said
column4: the pizza itself was just OK.  From the presentation
column5: to taste (the sausage was a little bland and there was hardly any cheese or sauce)
column6: I was just expecting more.  I truly do believe that if I had gone with a group and ordered a larger pizza (baked and served in the skillet)
column7: I may have added a star.  On the bright side
column8: their house salad with the creamy garlic dressing was very tasty
